availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John T. Scott (Hopkins Co., KY, gentleman, merchant)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, gentleman, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth H. Robertson Scott in Hopkins County, Kentucky, on August 8, 1861. Gentleman in Hopkins County in 1860. Merchant in Hopkins County in 1861. Merchant in Hopkins County in July 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Madisonville, p. 834.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994039, Hopkins County Marriages.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Hopkins County, KY, July 1863, p. 34.
"John T. Scott (25 Dec 1834-8 Jul 1910)," Find A Grave, Memorial #67541181, accessed October 8, 2020, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/67541181.
